title: What was the first live band to play music on WMFD Radio Station, when the station first began operating? My Grandfather Tomas Goff played in band and said he was in the first band to play live on WMFD back in the day! He is long goe but our family would like to know if this is indeed a act and if so we would love to hear the recording!
